definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to be unable to make any sense of the matter/to be at a loss
can't touch/can't reach/(fig.) unable to get a grasp of
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
irrelevant/can't make head or tail of
see 偷雞不成蝕把米|偷鸡不成蚀把米[tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3]
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 zhao2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: see 數不上|数不上[shu3 bu4 shang4]
lit. like a three-meter high monk, you can't rub his head (idiom)/fig. at a total loss
pinyin: zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3

definition: see 丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦|丈二和尚，摸不着头脑[zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3]
pinyin: zhang4 er4 Jin1 gang1 mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3

sentences.english: And when Owl hooted , Bluebird could not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当猫头鹰叫的时候，知更鸟睡不着。

sentences.english: You don't need me to explain the luck, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 关于幸运之神眷顾，我猜完全用不着解释了。

sentences.english: She put the medicine on the top shelf beyond the reach of her son .
sentences.chinese: 她把药放在了儿子够不着的最上面的架子上。

sentences.english: What should you do then on those sleepless nights?
sentences.chinese: 那么你在睡不着的夜晚干什么才好呢？

sentences.english: Mom, would you hang this towel on the rack for me, please. I can't reach it.
sentences.chinese: 老妈，请帮我把毛巾挂到架上，好吗？我够不着。

sentences.english: I couldn't go to sleep without getting something off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 我假如不将心事一吐为快就睡不着。

sentences.english: Unlike me, you work indoors and worry no rain or wind.
sentences.chinese: 你在这屋里，风吹不着雨淋不着的。

sentences.english: He keeps his opponents guessing what he would do next.
sentences.chinese: 他使他的对手猜不着他下一步要干什么。

sentences.english: That night, the boy couldn’t sleep for disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，小男孩失望极了，翻来覆去怎么也睡不着。

sentences.english: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
sentences.chinese: 那夜王睡不着觉，就吩咐人取历史来，念给他听。

sentences.english: Oh, you are the jerk who disturbed my sleep last night.
sentences.chinese: 就是昨天晚上拍桌子打椅子害我们睡不着的那个混蛋。

sentences.english: If your children can't reach the sink on their own, keep a stepstool handy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的孩子自己够不着洗手盆，就进放一张踏步凳。

sentences.english: I've tried counting sheep but I still can't get to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我也数过羊，可还是睡不着。

sentences.english: For 10 days Hobson could neither sleep nor dream.
sentences.chinese: 之后的十天他既睡不着也做不了梦。

sentences.english: I can do without your advice, if you don't mind.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不介意，我用不着你的劝告。

sentences.english: Keep her food out of reach when you're not home.
sentences.chinese: 当你不在家的时候，使她的食物在够不着的地方。

definition: contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
to be dead/not to be, or cease to exist
it's time (to do sth)/the time has come
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
to be not less than (a certain quantity, amount etc)
not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
comes at the end of the sentence to indicate a strong degree/quite/rather
